reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that different types of data including log data, device data, personal information, and business data may be collected by the app.
reply.reference: The privacy policy document specifies the collection of various types of data such as log data, device data, personal information, and business data. URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/

source_documents.excerpt:
Privacy Policy
Your privacy is important to us. It is DojoLabs Pty Ltd’s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://cancerdojo.com, and other sites we own and operate.
1. Information we collect
Log data
When you visit our website, our servers may automatically log the standard data provided by your web browser. It may include your computer’s Internet Protocol (IP) address, your browser type and version, the pages you visit, the ti...

market and promote our services, and to protect our legal rights and interests;
- you give us consent to do so for a specific purpose (for example, you might consent to us sending you our newsletter); or
- we need to process your data to comply with a legal obligation.
Where you consent to our use of information about you for a specific purpose, you have the right to change your mind at any time (but this will not affect any processing that has already taken place).
We don’t keep personal inform...

Date of birth
- Phone/mobile number
- Website address
- Payment information
- Tax/SSN/Medicare/etc. number
Business data
Business data refers to data that accumulates over the normal course of operation on our platform. This may include transaction records, stored files, user profiles, analytics data and other metrics, as well as other types of information, created or generated, as users interact with our services.
2. Legal bases for processing
We will process your personal information lawfully,...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as Name, Social media profiles, Date of birth, Phone/mobile number, Website address, Payment information, Tax/SSN/Medicare/etc. number, and Business data including transaction records, stored files, user profiles, analytics data, and other metrics.

content: Business data (transaction records, stored files, user profiles, analytics data, etc.)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the specific types of data collected by the app, including personal information like name, phone number, and payment details, as well as business data such as transaction records and user profiles.
reply.reference: Name, Social media profiles, Date of birth, Phone/mobile number, Website address, Payment information, Tax/SSN/Medicare/etc. number, Business data (transaction records, stored files, user profiles, analytics data, etc.) URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes for which data is collected and used, including providing core features, contacting users, analytics, marketing, legal compliance, and more.
reply.reference: We may collect, hold, use and disclose information for the following purposes and personal information will not be further processed in a manner that is incompatible with these purposes: ...URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that users can unsubscribe from the email database, opt-out of communications, and request erasure of personal information, indicating they have the ability to opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: Unsubscribe: To unsubscribe from our e-mail database or opt-out of communications (including marketing communications), please contact us using the details below or opt-out using the opt-out facilities provided in the communication. Correction: If you believe that any information we hold about you is inaccurate, out of date, incomplete, irrelevant or misleading, please contact us. You may request that we erase the personal information we hold about you at any time. URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app discloses personal information to third parties for various purposes, including providing services, marketing, and data collection and processing.
reply.reference: We may disclose personal information to third party service providers for enabling them to provide their services, sponsors of competitions, and other third parties assisting in providing information or services. URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third parties such as IT service providers, data storage providers, web-hosting providers, debt collectors, maintenance providers, marketing providers, professional advisors, payment systems operators, sponsors of competitions, agents or sub-contractors, and third parties assisting in providing information, products, services, or direct marketing.

content: Third parties assisting in providing information, products, services, or direct marketing

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies various third parties with whom the app shares data for different purposes. These third parties include a wide range of service providers and entities involved in different aspects of the app's operations.
reply.reference: The app shares data with third parties, including IT service providers, data storage, web-hosting and server providers, debt collectors, maintenance or problem-solving providers, marketing or advertising providers, professional advisors and payment systems operators; our employees, contractors and/or related entities; sponsors or promoters of any competition we run; third parties, including agents or sub-contractors, who assist us in providing information, products, services or direct marketing to you; and third parties to collect and process data. URL: https://cancerdojo.com/privacy-policy/
